resources.string: By clicking Create Account you agree with snail talk terms and conditions.

Snail Talk is a messenger that is as fast and easy as texting only for FREE! Snail messenger uses your phone’s internet connection (whether Wi-Fi or your data plan) to let you send text messages, share photos and videos, add stickers, or make voice calls and video chats - all for FREE! •GROUP CHATS: Have group chats with up to 200 participants. You can also ‘like’ each other’s messages. •DELETE A MESSAGE: Delete a message even after it was sent! •HIDDEN CHATS – Hide specific chats from your messaging screen.
